author: stevel
msg: there is no point swallowing an exception if it leaves your class in an unstable state. Exceptions are there for a reason, and it is to eliminate this kind of behaviour.
Also, use Locale.English for case conversions. Not all countries Map toLower(I) to i, turkey in particular.

author: stevel
msg: 1. when bad things happen, include the trace in the log.

author: cutting
msg: Start namenode before datanodes to minimize datanode startup errors.
